FODMAP_LIST.CONVENTIONAL_MEAT: Conventional meat, unclear if all meat preferably would be excluded (inflammatory, high in omega 6)
FODMAP_LIST.DAIRY: Dairy products (can be inflammatory, milk protein)
FODMAP_LIST.GRASSFED_WILD_MEATS: Unclear if grassfed and wild meats are okay or just better than similar alternatives
FODMAP_LIST.NUTS_SEED: Nuts and seeds, including oils based on them (antinutrients, some are inflammatory or/and have high in omega 6)
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_FODMAP_1: The low FODMAP diet is a diet that removes ingredients that produces more gas and fluids in the bowel (ingredients with high FODMAP). This diet is recommended for people with IBS and have shown in studies that most people with IBS notice improvements after it.
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_FODMAP_2: However, it is very individual how the stomach reacts to foods and some people with IBS can eat certain high FODMAP ingredients without backlash. Therefore, it is recommended to try out more ingredients after you have been on the low FODMAP diet for a while.
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_FODMAP_3: Even if you do not have IBS but have problems with bloating or similar issues it can be a good idea to try this diet och see if it improves your problems. If you are fully healthy then there is no need for this diet.
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_FODMAP_4: Below is a list which shows what FODMAP level common ingredients have. Low means that it is safe to consume while high means you should avoid it. Some ingredients are low FODMAP only in smaller amounts and therefore get a "medium" level.
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_ME_1: The ME diet is a diet directed to people with ME/CFS. In short, this diet removes ingredients that are straining on the body (FODMAP somewhat aside). So this diet might be a good idea to try fully or incorporate more elements from for anyone (especially if you have food/stomach problems). The factors this diet considers are the inflammatory aspect, sugar, caffeine, gluten, milk protein (irritate immune system), antinutrients (natural substances that inhibit the body's nutritional absorption) and high in omega 6 (inflammatory). The foods that the ME diet includes are:
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_ME_3: A full list of how all the common ingredients fit the ME diet is shown below. The ingredients that are fully ME diet approved have two stars on the left (**). If the ingredient is a better option than similar ingredients or might be okay in smaller amounts they get one star (*). A filter below exist to only show ME approved ingredients.
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_ME_4: I got this diet from my ME center. Even though they have this diet as a treatment they also note that there has not yet been conclusive studies to neither confirm nor deny that this diet is effective for people with ME/CFS. Also, when creating this list some liberties were taken to fill in the gaps of foods not mentioned in the treatment plan. I also created the "Semi ME diet" on the recipe page which includes the recipes that does not fully follow the ME diet, but where the majority of the ingredients are ME or semi ME friendly and can have a smaller amount of not approved ingredients.
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_ME_5: Once again, how the stomach reacts to foods is very individual (allergies, intolerances, IBS, etc) and therefore diets might be better to follow more as a guide than an absolute.
FODMAP_LIST.TEXT_ME_6: You can find sources at the bottom of this page.

INGREDIENT.HARD_CHEESES: Hard cheese (example: feta, gauda, mozzarella, parmesan)
INGREDIENT.SOFT_CHEESES: Soft cheese (example: cream, cottage, mascarpone, keso, ricotta)

STEPS.2: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately och then mix them together

STEPS.3: Add all ingredients for the jam into a pot and cook for 15 minutes stirring frequently, and then let cool for a bit

STEPS.5: Set aside 1 packed cup of dough och add the rest to an 8-inch square pan with parchment paper
STEPS.6: Press down on the dough to spread it out evenly, add the jam and then crumble the remaining cup of dough over the jam layer
STEPS.8: Store any leftover squares in a sealed container in the fridge for up to 1 week, or in the freezer for up to 6 weeks

STEPS.7: Bred frostningen på pepparkakan vid servering

STEPS.1: Krossa alla pepparkakor för hand eller med stavmixer och en del av mjölken
STEPS.3: Häll upp i glas och eventuellt sprinkla på lite pepparkakssmulor på toppen

COMMON_STEPS.DO_APPLY_TOPPING_CROSTINI: Lägg pålägget på upplagda crostini och servera
COMMON_STEPS.DO_CRUSH_COOKIES: Krossa alla kakor för hand eller i en matberedare
COMMON_STEPS.DO_MIX_WITH_REST: Lägg i övriga ingredienser och blanda
COMMON_STEPS.DO_SALT_PEPPER_IF_NEEDED: Smaka av med salt och peppar
COMMON_STEPS.DO_SERVE_WITH_RICE_SEEDS: Servera gärna till ris och rostade frön
COMMON_STEPS.DO_TAKE_OF_STOVE_AND_MIX: Ta av kastrullen från spisen och mixa soppan slät med stavmixer
COMMON_STEPS.DO_USE_MIXER_OR_HAND_BLENDER: Mixa alla ingredienserna i matberedare eller med stavmixer

MAKI.1: Lägg sushiriset på en nori eller i en sushibozoka
MAKI.3: Rulla ihop innehållet eller använd sushibazokan för att få ut en rund form och sedan rulla ihop den
MAKI.5: Toppa eventuellt med sesamfrön och/eller sås

NIGIRI.1: Rulla ihop riset med blöta händer i ovala bollar
NIGIRI.NORI_TOP: Lägg på ingredienserna och slut ihop allt med en noribit
NIGIRI.NORI_AROUND: Lägg nori runt om riset och lägg i ingredienserna på toppen

COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_BUCKWHEAT_PASTA: Koka upp pastan enligt anvisningarna på förpackningen
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_CARAMEL_1: Blanda ihop chiaägget och låt stå i minst 10 minuter
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_CARAMEL_3: Häll lite av den heta smeten i en kopp med kallt vatten och går smeten att forma till en rund kula är den färdig, annars får smeten koka några min till
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_CARAMEL_4: Ifall kolan är för hård i kulproven kan mer vatten läggas i så blir den mjukare
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_CARAMEL_5: Häll upp smeten i små knäckformar ställda på en plåt
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_CHIA_EGG: Blanda ihop chiaägget och låt stå i minst 10 minuter
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_CHIA_PUDDING: If wanted, wait 15-30 min for a thicker consistency
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_LENTILS_1: Skölj linserna och lägg sedan allt i en kastrull
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_LENTILS_2: Koka i cirka 10 minuter eller tills linserna är mjuka
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_MILK: Värm mjölken till önskad temperatur i mikro eller kastrull
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_MUSHROOMS_1: Skölj svampen och hacka dem sedan i valfi storlek
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_MUSHROOMS_2: Häll i svampen med cirka en halv deciliter vatten i en stekpanna och stek på full värme tills nästan allt vatten är borta
COMMON_STEPS.PREPARE_ORANGES: Skär apelsinerna i bitar och skär bort allt det vita + hinnan
COMMON_STEPS.PUT_DRESSING_IN_BOWL: Blanda ihop dressingen i en skål
COMMON_STEPS.PUT_DRESSING_IN_MIXER: Lägg i alla ingredienser till dressingen i en matberedare och mixa
COMMON_STEPS.PUT_EVERYTHING_IN_BOWL: Lägg i alla ingredienser i en skål och blanda
COMMON_STEPS.PUT_EVERYTHING_IN_MIXER: Lägg i alla ingredienser i en matberedare och mixa
COMMON_STEPS.PUT_EVERYTHING_IN_POT_AND_BOIL_EXCEPT_VE: Lägg allt i en kastrull förutom grönsakerna och koka upp
COMMON_STEPS.PUT_EVERYTHING_IN_POT_AND_BOIL: Lägg allt i en kastrull och koka upp
COMMON_STEPS.PUT_MARINADE_IN_BOWL: Blanda ihop marinaden i en skål

TAGS.MATCHES_ONE: Recipe matches at least one selected
